verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> to Aaron, <WH175> You and your sons <WH1121> and your father's <WH1> house <WH1004> with you shall bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of the sanctuary: <WH4720> and you and your sons <WH1121> with you shall bear <WH5375> the iniquity <WH5771> of your priesthood. <WH3550>

And your brothers <WH251> also <WH1571> of the tribe <WH4294> of Levi, <WH3878> the tribe <WH7626> of your father, <WH1> bring <WH7126> you with you, that they may be joined <WH3867> to you, and minister <WH8334> to you: but you and your sons <WH1121> with you shall minister before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH168> of witness. <WH5715>

And they shall keep <WH8104> your charge, <WH4931> and the charge <WH4931> of all <WH3605> the tabernacle: <WH168> only <WH389> they shall not come <WH7126> near <WH7126> the vessels <WH3627> of the sanctuary <WH6944> and the altar, <WH4196> that neither <WH3808> <WH1571> they, nor you also, <WH1571> die. <WH4191>

And they shall be joined <WH3867> to you, and keep <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> for all <WH3605> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle: <WH168> and a stranger <WH376> <WH2114> shall not come <WH7126> near <WH7126> to you.

And you shall keep <WH8104> the charge <WH4931> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> and the charge <WH4931> of the altar: <WH4196> that there be no <WH3808> wrath <WH7110> any more <WH5750> on the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And I, behold, <WH2009> I have taken <WH3947> your brothers <WH251> the Levites <WH3881> from among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> to you they are given <WH5414> as a gift <WH4979> for the LORD, <WH3068> to do <WH5647> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

Therefore you and your sons <WH1121> with you shall keep <WH8104> your priest's <WH3550> office for everything <WH3605> <WH1697> of the altar, <WH4196> and within <WH1004> the veil; <WH6532> and you shall serve: <WH5647> I have given <WH5414> your priest's <WH3550> office to you as a service <WH5656> of gift: <WH4979> and the stranger <WH376> <WH2114> that comes <WH7131> near <WH7126> shall be put to death. <WH4191>

And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Aaron, <WH175> Behold, <WH2009> I also have given <WH5414> you the charge <WH4931> of my heave <WH8641> offerings <WH8641> of all <WH3605> the hallowed <WH6944> things of the children <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478> to you have I given <WH5414> them by reason of the anointing, <WH4888> and to your sons, <WH1121> by an ordinance <WH2706> for ever. <WH5769>

This <WH2088> shall be your of the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> things, reserved from the fire: <WH784> every <WH3605> oblation <WH7133> of theirs, every <WH3605> meat offering <WH4503> of theirs, and every <WH3605> sin <WH2403> offering of theirs, and every <WH3605> trespass <WH817> offering of theirs which <WH834> they shall render <WH7725> to me, shall be most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> for you and for your sons. <WH1121>
In the most <WH6944> holy <WH6944> place shall you eat <WH398> it; every <WH3605> male <WH2145> shall eat <WH398> it: it shall be holy <WH6944> to you.

And this <WH2088> is yours; the heave <WH8641> offering <WH8641> of their gift, <WH4976> with all <WH3605> the wave <WH8573> offerings of the children <WH1121> of Israel: <WH3478> I have given <WH5414> them to you, and to your sons <WH1121> and to your daughters <WH1323> with you, by a statute <WH2706> for ever: <WH5769> every <WH3605> one that is clean <WH2889> in your house <WH1004> shall eat <WH398> of it.

All <WH3605> the best <WH2459> of the oil, <WH8081> and all <WH3605> the best <WH2459> of the wine, <WH8492> and of the wheat, <WH1715> the first fruits <WH7225> of them which <WH834> they shall offer <WH5414> to the LORD, <WH3068> them have I given <WH5414> you.

And whatever <WH3605> <WH834> is first <WH1061> ripe <WH1061> in the land, <WH776> which <WH834> they shall bring <WH935> to the LORD, <WH3068> shall be yours; every <WH3605> one that is clean <WH2889> in your house <WH1004> shall eat <WH398> of it.
Every thing <WH3605> devoted <WH2764> in Israel <WH3478> shall be yours.

Every <WH3605> thing that opens <WH6363> the matrix <WH7358> in all <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> which <WH834> they bring <WH7126> to the LORD, <WH3068> whether it be of men <WH120> or <WH176> beasts, <WH929> shall be yours: nevertheless <WH389> the firstborn <WH1060> of man <WH120> shall you surely redeem, <WH6299> and the firstling <WH1060> of unclean <WH2931> beasts <WH929> shall you redeem. <WH6299>

And those that are to be redeemed <WH6299> from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> shall you redeem, <WH6299> according to your estimation, <WH6187> for the money <WH3701> of five <WH2568> shekels, <WH8255> after the shekel <WH8255> of the sanctuary, <WH6944> which <WH1958> is twenty <WH6242> gerahs. <WH1626>

But the firstling <WH1060> of a cow, <WH7794> or the firstling <WH1060> of a sheep, <WH3775> or <WH176> the firstling <WH1060> of a goat, <WH5795> you shall not redeem; <WH6299> they are holy: <WH6944> you shall sprinkle <WH2236> their blood <WH1818> on the altar, <WH4196> and shall burn <WH6999> their fat <WH2459> for an offering made by fire, for a sweet <WH5207> smell <WH7381> to the LORD. <WH3068>
And the flesh <WH1320> of them shall be yours, as the wave <WH8573> breast <WH2373> and as the right <WH3225> shoulder <WH7785> are yours.

All <WH3605> the heave <WH8641> offerings <WH8641> of the holy <WH6944> things, which <WH834> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> offer <WH7311> to the LORD, <WH3068> have I given <WH5414> you, and your sons <WH1121> and your daughters <WH1323> with you, by a statute <WH2706> for ever: <WH5769> it is a covenant <WH1285> of salt <WH4417> for ever <WH5769> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> to you and to your seed <WH2233> with you.

And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to Aaron, <WH175> You shall have no <WH3808> inheritance <WH5157> in their land, <WH776> neither <WH3808> shall you have <WH1961> any part <WH2506> among <WH8432> them: I am your part <WH2506> and your inheritance <WH5159> among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

And, behold, <WH2009> I have given <WH5414> the children <WH1121> of Levi <WH3878> all <WH3605> the tenth <WH4643> in Israel <WH3478> for an inheritance, <WH5159> for their service <WH5656> which <WH834> they serve, <WH5647> even the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

Neither <WH3808> must the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from now on <WH5750> come <WH7126> near <WH7126> the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> lest they bear <WH5375> sin, <WH2399> and die. <WH4191>

But the Levites <WH3881> shall do <WH5647> the service <WH5656> of the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation, <WH4150> and they shall bear <WH5375> their iniquity: <WH5771> it shall be a statute <WH2708> for ever <WH5769> throughout your generations, <WH1755> that among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> they have no <WH3808> inheritance. <WH5159>

But the tithes <WH4643> of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> which <WH834> they offer <WH7311> as an heave <WH8641> offering <WH8641> to the LORD, <WH3068> I have given <WH5414> to the Levites <WH3881> to inherit: <WH5159> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> I have said <WH559> to them, Among <WH8432> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> they shall have no <WH3808> inheritance. <WH5159>
And the LORD <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>

Thus speak <WH1696> to the Levites, <WH3881> and say <WH559> to them, When <WH3588> you take <WH3947> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> the tithes <WH4643> which <WH834> I have given <WH5414> you from them for your inheritance, <WH5159> then you shall offer <WH7311> up an heave <WH8641> offering <WH8641> of it for the LORD, <WH3068> even a tenth <WH4643> part <WH2506> of the tithe. <WH4643>

And this your heave <WH8641> offering <WH8641> shall be reckoned <WH2803> to you, as though it were the corn <WH1715> of the threshing floor, <WH1637> and as the fullness <WH4395> of the wine press. <WH3342>

Thus <WH3651> you also <WH1571> shall offer <WH7311> an heave <WH8641> offering <WH8641> to the LORD <WH3068> of all <WH3605> your tithes, <WH4643> which <WH834> you receive <WH3947> of the children <WH1121> of Israel; <WH3478> and you shall give <WH5414> thereof the LORD's <WH3068> heave <WH8641> offering <WH8641> to Aaron <WH175> the priest. <WH3548>

Out of all <WH3605> your gifts <WH4979> you shall offer <WH7311> every <WH3605> heave <WH8641> offering <WH8641> of the LORD, <WH3068> of all <WH3605> the best <WH2459> thereof, even <WH853> the hallowed <WH4720> part thereof out of it.

Therefore you shall say <WH559> to them, When you have heaved <WH7311> the best <WH2459> thereof from it, then it shall be counted <WH2803> to the Levites <WH3881> as the increase <WH8393> of the threshing floor, <WH1637> and as the increase <WH8393> of the wine press. <WH3342>

And you shall eat <WH398> it in every <WH3605> place, <WH4725> you and your households: <WH1004> for it is your reward <WH7939> for your service <WH5656> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation. <WH4150>

And you shall bear <WH5375> no <WH3808> sin <WH2399> by reason <WH5921> of it, when you have heaved <WH7311> from it the best <WH2459> of it: neither <WH3808> shall you pollute <WH2490> the holy <WH6944> things of the children <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> lest <WH3808> you die. <WH4191>
